It's important to remember these strategies require guidance from professionals who specialize in cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) as they learn and apply them effectively under their supervision.

I encourage you to seek professional help, wherein a licensed therapist can provide personalized support tailored specifically for your needs through various methods such as CBT or other evidence-based approaches like mindfulness practices that have been shown to be effective in managing anxiety symptoms. Additionally, exploring online resources can offer supplementary information on coping skills for anxiety while waiting to consult with or secure an appointment with a professional therapist.
